cardsActivity.description: In this project, I created a CV using an existing Canva template and followed its structure throughout the design.
This activity consists of 10 tasks that required making decisions using conditional statements such as if, elif, and else.
This was a first look at dictionaries, with only two tasks designed to practice and understand how dictionaries work.
It was necessary to display an options menu to the user and make decisions based on the userâ€™s input. At this stage, I began wrapping the logic inside functions to follow the DRY principle.
This activity provided a first look at data persistence using the CSV format to store and handle data, and helped build confidence in using functions.

finalTests.description: I start to modularize code, due to identify some patterns that let me see that a bunch of code it was been repited along all the code and some functios had a strong relation among them, based on this hypotesis I took the decision to work on each one using something called atomic design, where we have atoms(functios stored inside helpers folder),molecules(functions stored inside, services folder), organism(functions stored inside modules folder) and templates(union of all of them on the app folder)
